date.description: Date when the feedback was received.

rating.description: Numeric rating provided by the buyer (e.g., 1 to 5 stars).

comments.description: Text comments provided by the buyer when leaving feedback.

response.description: Optional response from the seller to the buyer's feedback.

order_id.description: Unique identifier for the order associated with the feedback.

rater_email.description: Email address of the buyer who provided the feedback.

dataEndTime.description: End time of the data collection period.
